achievements_star.s: Legacy on-prem servers causing outages and manual patch cycles.
achievements_star.t: Improve availability and reduce maintenance effort.
achievements_star.a: Led 3-person team to migrate 22 services to virtualized platform; scripted patch windows and baseline configs.
achievements_star.r: Unplanned outages reduced 45%; patching time cut 50%; audit findings closed (0 open).
achievements_star.bullet: Reduced outages 45% by virtualizing 22 services and automating patch baselines; closed all audit findings.

achievements_star.s: Manual identity management process causing compliance delays.
achievements_star.a: Developed PowerShell scripts to sync Active Directory with cloud IAM; implemented automated workflows.
achievements_star.r: Account provisioning time reduced from 3 days to 2 hours; compliance audit score improved 30%.
achievements_star.bullet: Automated IAM provisioning reducing turnaround from 3 days to 2 hours; improved compliance audit scores 30%.

achievements_star.s: Inconsistent access reviews and stale accounts.
achievements_star.a: Implemented quarterly access recertifications and scripted stale-account sweeps.
achievements_star.r: Dormant accounts reduced 70%; access review cycle time down 40%.
achievements_star.bullet: Cut dormant accounts 70% and access review cycle time 40% by automating quarterly IAM recertifications.

achievements_star.s: No centralized logging solution causing delayed incident response.
achievements_star.a: Deployed Splunk infrastructure across 50+ servers; created custom dashboards and alerts.
achievements_star.r: Mean time to detect security incidents reduced from 48 hours to 15 minutes; prevented 12 potential breaches.
achievements_star.bullet: Reduced incident detection time from 48 hours to 15 minutes by deploying Splunk monitoring across 50+ servers.

achievements_star.s: Server patching causing frequent unplanned downtime.
achievements_star.a: Created staging environment and automated testing procedures for patch validation.
achievements_star.r: Patch-related outages reduced 85%; mean time to recovery improved from 4 hours to 45 minutes.
achievements_star.bullet: Reduced patch-related outages 85% through automated testing in staging environment.
